Gaia Herbs
Emotional Balance - 60 Liquid Phyto-Caps | Gaia Herbs
Maintaining a healthy emotional state is key to an optimal quality of life. Emotional Balance is designed to support mental and emotional wellbeing. By combining herbal extracts that have been traditionally used to help the body cope with daily stress, nourish the nervous system, calm the mind, and support a balanced mood, this formula helps foster a better outlook on life.
